From: "SOULSTICE" <thecode@...>

Gotron leapt the sweep and landed on his feet, the gun still aimed towards
Lady Hawk's head.

Gotron: Now you see? It is so easy to die in this world. Anyone can be your
friend...or your enemy. Burning Hammer taught me that. Who do you think
Zardus would believe? I can plant all of the evidence in my favor, it'll
look like I killed you out of self defense. Now get out of here!.....You are
free to go.....I do not wish to harm another Alliance member, but I do as I
must. My temper is boiling, so just get away from me.

Gotron aims downward and fires at Lady Hawk's feet.

Gotron: Run!

----- Original Message -----
From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
Subject: Bad move Soulstice.


> Lady Hawk looked at the blaster, then followed the arm down to the body.
She
> then followed the body down to the feat and back up to look him in the
eyes.
> "I hope you know what you're doing, This just proves the point about the
> barbarism in the war." Quickly Lady Hawk dropped to one knee and threw a
leg
> sweep at Gotron.
>
> She transformed to her half hawk form and readied herself for a battle.
> Gotron had an energy weapon and she had her abilities, she almost fealt
> sorry that the only action these bots knew was to resort to violence to
> solve thier problems.
